name: Boomerang Quest
description:
Boomerang Quest Made for the Weekly Game Jam 195
Theme: Boomerang

Don't get it in your eye... Get it in theirs!

Just like a boomerang returns, we returned to a previous era with this small action adventure in a GameBoy-style feel.

Move: Arrow keys
Throw Boomerang: X

Coding, music and Sound Effects: Lumensum
Artwork: Ome Sjo
